post.body: you're def right...she and duran are endless founts of info a/b music. It's why i keep em around:)
feel better kiddo! Hope to see you tonight!
seriously, he'd better watch out:)
It's cartoon Sara Bareilles and Ingrid Michaelson...they're just so cute:)
You need to watch it...it will make your heart happy!
i constantly have those days love:) moms are hard to please...
even the look on his face was one of complete & utter frustration w/ my ignorance a/b the temperature of wood...i'll admit
they say some crazy things...i asked him exactly how hot wood is and he said, 'oh ms welch, you don't understand' & walked away.
Breakfast of Champions:)
however, I can remember details so if you want to give me a call...that'd be super:) SORRY!!!
I emailed you letting you know that I couldn't find the exact skit, boo. I'm pretty sure that I'm dumb, I should have bookmarked:)
praying for kevin and you...i know you're so sad to see him like that. Hoping for a quick recovery.
he's dumb...but he's cute, so I keep him around:)
I love dominoes:)
I have been trying to call you for an hour but my phone won't call out...will you try to call me???? Pretty please:)
Give Andrea and Abby my love!!
That's worth it, I suppose. Duran seems to think the roads are a lot worse here than they are in Hot Springs...
don't get out in this weather. It's going to be scary after dark. If you do though, be careful!!!
Eh, just slushy but it'll all freeze over again tonight...it's actually snowin a lil bit which is pretty:)
Yes! Thank you!!!
quit watchin stinkin football and talk to your @girlfriend :)
We all already knew that even if we didn't tell you:)
so jealous! Let me know how it is!
i know the feeling, my brothers usually don't even get up until 10, no more early morn excitement...aah the joys of being a kid.
Never mind...it sent them back to me and said that email address wasn't usable. Got another place I can send them??
I emailed them...you didn't get them??
haha...glad to be of assistance:) My life is FULL of these kinds of moments.
I think so...I'm actually washing the whole load again. What a waste of precious resources:(
we also LOVE Ruby!
We need to get the 'work' done before He gets here...#rol
The more i get of Him, the more i want to change. I love that! #rol
The methodist church would love you @bobcoghs in your early days. Those folks get ticked if they're not out by 12...i would know:)
That lady's crazy, she needs to get a gardener...haha i wish you knew my brother, that sounds just like somethin he would say:)
Thanks @dcreason for that wonderful egg nog shake...you just keep makin your case for best boyfriend in the world:)
I can't wait for national championship game...as much as i hate to say it, GO GATORS! I support my sec boys:)
Honestly, it's a lil embarassing...it keeps jerkin my head and it scares me everytime. :)
My car's on cruise ctrl but my crazy accelerator has a mind own, it keeps speedin up with no foot on the gas. Magic, my kids wd call it:)
Oh yeah, thanks:) @britnich21
I really, REALLY love 23 miles:) a little rascal flatts-ish but i'm okay with that...
It kind of scared them, so i had to explain myself:)
Allow me to clarify, i was talking a/b being engaged because a friend of mine called to tell me her news and i kind of freaked out:)
Also two of my girls told me that they loved duran and that they were going to 'engage' him:)
After explaining to my kids what 'being engaged' means, i got 8 proposals from some of the cutest boys on the planet:)
Had lunch with part of the fam today...nice to see them when it's not expected:)
At my cousin's Christmas choir concert...love it:) going to eat some fabulous southwest chicken soup when i get home...love that even more.
That for just a second, my curiousity was piqued and i thought, 'maybe he knows somethin i don't...' but then i came to my senses:)
Recess is great today, it's so nice out. One of my boys just told me that he is 'hot as wood and i'm ready to go in, okay?' they're so cute.
That last twitter was for @michellemaggard :)
Prayin your babies get to feelin better! I have a really strong immune system...if you need anything, let me know!
Not sure that did any good but it was a powerful honk, so maybe...
A man is driving next to me with a forward facing carseat, teeny baby inside in the FRONT seat!! Boo...i honked loudly.
Finally found our gingerbread man after a 2 day hunt. He's been running all over the school...those gingerbread men are so sneaky:)
Still workin on solvin the mystery of who peeked before it was time and let that stinker out. My kids are convinced it was the principal:)
Finally found our gingerbread man after a 2 day hunt. He's been running all over the school...those gingerbread men are so sneaky:)
Still workin on solvin the mystery of who peeked before it was time and let that stinker out. My kids are convinced it was the principal:)
On the way to school...tomorrow's friday. That makes me happy:)
I love, love, LOVE Biggest Loser!! :)
Man, my mom was coming tomorrow for Rockettes...hope that the roads clear off tomorrow afternoon so she can get here:) I miss her!
I heart Jill Bozeman right now in a BIG way!!!
I am completely finished shopping...completely finished wrapping gifts...and completely and totally in love:)
I am COMPLETELY finished with my Christmas shopping!! YAY!!
Bout to venture out...should be fun:)
I'm about to wrap some Christmas gifts...SO excited about staying home today!!
Goodnight all:) I get to sleep in tomorrow and I am SOOOOO excited about it!!
YAY! NO SCHOOL TOMORROW! Pretty sure all students and teachers in LR will be enjoying a few more minutes of sleep tomorrow:)
Hey kiddos...please direct msg me your addresses! I'd LOVE to send you a Christmas card:)
Someone please tell me to get up and go clean my kitchen...........
Although, i don't know of any super heroes who are famous for super sensitive hearing...oh well, Merry Christmas tweeple!
Now that i've gotten rid of this cold, my ears are finally 'unstopped' & i am hearing better than ever...think i might now be a super hero:)
I love you @dwabmom. You are amazing! Keep your chin up! Merry Christmas!
Board games w/ the fam-check, awesome meal-check, said g'night to the boy-check, just waitin on santa:) 'night all & a very Merry CHRISTmas!
Candlelight Christmas eve service-check, advent candles ALL lit-check, dogs all snug in their beds-check,
Finally in newport and loving on my little ed...he's so darn cute. Oh, i've never seen any star wars either. Commence the stone throwing:)
I evidently forgot to check my gas gauge before i left lr...i'm running on fumes and still have 8 miles to go:)
It was the thing of detergent I've been searching for...and it is completely chopped up...which is a mess but my apt smells LOVELY:)
Well, then it started to get really crazy...so I opened up the washer and guess what was inside??????
Started my laundry & it was making a funny noise, just thought things weren't even & was waiting to straighten it out til the rinse cycle.
I've been looking everywhere for my detergent and finally went and bought a brand new thing of it on Sunday...
Okay, i am officially NOT meant to be domesticated. I am waiting to go home until tomorrow, so I decided to do some laundry....
I'm heading to newport tonight and the roads are disgusting...ugh:(
